mapper.select:
select distinct c1.APP_ID, c1.C1_CNAME, c1.C1_IDNBR, c2.C2_CNAME, c2.C2_IDNBR, d.flag, y.LAOJIANFLAG, d.app_result, w.PATCH_CODE, c1.YDJ_FLAG, c1.APP_PROD, (select count(OPAS_ALLOT_APPLY_REMARK.REMARK_ID) from OPAS_ALLOT_APPLY_REMARK where OPAS_ALLOT_APPLY_REMARK.APP_ID = c1.APP_ID) as remark, c1.MATCHING_CARD_FLAG from OPAS_BIZ_INP_APPL_C1 c1 left join OPAS_BIZ_INP_APPL_C2 c2 on c2.APP_ID = c1.APP_ID left join OPAS_ALLOT_APPLY_ALLOT y on y.app_id = c1.app_id left join (select rn,app_id,patch_code from ( select row_number() over (partition by APP_ID order by operat_time desc) as rn,app_id,patch_code from OPAS_FILE_PATCHBOLT_HIS ) where rn = 1) w on w.app_id = c1.APP_ID left join OPAS_FILE_APPLICATION_DETAIL d on d.app_id = c1.app_id where not exists (select t.id_no from OPAS_VVIP_LIST t, OPAS_FILE_APPLICATION_DETAIL l where t.id_no = l.cred_no and t.id_no = c1.C1_IDNBR)
and c1.APP_ID = #{appId}
and (c1.APP_ID like '${appId}%')
and (c1.APP_ID like '${appId}%' or reverse(c1.app_id) like reverse('%${appId}'))
and c1.C1_CNAME like '${c1Cname}%'
and c1.C1_IDNBR like '${c1Idnbr}%'
and c1.C1_MOBILE = #{c1Mobile}
and c1.YDJ_FLAG = #{ydjFlag}
and c1.APP_PROD = #{appProd}
and c2.C2_CNAME like '${c2Cname}%'
and c2.C2_IDNBR like '${c2Idnbr}%'
and substr(c1.APP_ID,1,6) < to_char(sysdate-365,'yymmdd')
and substr(c1.APP_ID,1,6) >= to_char(sysdate-365,'yymmdd')
order by substr(c1.APP_ID,1,6) desc,substr(c1.app_id,7,1) desc,c1.app_id

select c1.APP_ID, tab.OPERATE_RESULT from OPAS_BIZ_INP_APPL_C1 c1 left join (select e.APP_ID, e.OPERATE_RESULT, row_number() over(partition by e.APP_ID order by e.LST_UPD_DATE desc) rank from OPAS_APPLY_LIFE_CICLE e) tab on tab.APP_ID = c1.APP_ID and rank = 1
select c1.APP_ID , c2.CURR_OPT_USER ,c2.CURR_NODE from OPAS_BIZ_INP_APPL_C1 c1 , OPAS_ALLOT_APPLY_ALLOT c2 where c1.APP_ID=c2.APP_ID

select c1.APP_ID, tab.OPERATE_RESULT from OPAS_BIZ_INP_APPL_HISTORY_C1 c1 left join (select e.APP_ID, e.OPERATE_RESULT, row_number() over(partition by e.APP_ID order by e.LST_UPD_DATE desc) rank from OPAS_APPLY_LIFE_CICLE e) tab on tab.APP_ID = c1.APP_ID and rank = 1
SELECT C1_COCODE, C1_CONAME, C1_COADD1||C1_COADD2||C1_COADD3||C1_COADD4 AS C1_COADDRESS FROM OPAS_BIZ_INP_APPL_C1 WHERE APP_ID = #{appId,jdbcType=CHAR}
select c1.APP_ID , c2.CURR_OPT_USER ,c2.CURR_NODE from OPAS_BIZ_INP_APPL_HISTORY_C1 c1 , OPAS_ALLOT_APPLY_ALLOT c2 where c1.APP_ID=c2.APP_ID

select c1.APP_ID, c1.C1_CONAME, c1.C4_APBATCH, c1.YDJ_FLAG, c2.DECISION_DESP, c7.PROPOSED_LMT, c7.TRIGGER_TYPE, c3.NUMBER_READ, c6.JOB_BF_MINCOME, C6.REF_UN_PLGE_DTI,c6.DECISION_DESP, c6.REF_CP_DTI, c6.REF_MUE, c5.MASTERCARD_APPROVEREUSLT, c5.APPROVE_CREDIT_PRODUCT,c5.APPROVER, c5.APPROVE_CREDIT_LIMIT, c5.APPROVE_RESULT, c5.POLICY_CODE1, c5.VIOLATE_CODE1, c5.REFUSE_CODE1, c5.MEMO, c5.CREDIT_RESULT, c5.MANUAL_LIMIT, c6.UN_PLGE_DTI, c6.CP_DTI,c6.MUE, c7.CUST_TYPE, c8.AUDITOR_NAME, c9.CREDITER_NAME, c10.IVS_SCORE, c11.ZM_SCORE, c12.BRCREDITPOINT, get_age(#{appId}) as AGE, c14.CURR_STATUS, (select count(OPAS_ALLOT_APPLY_REMARK.REMARK_ID) from OPAS_ALLOT_APPLY_REMARK where OPAS_ALLOT_APPLY_REMARK.APP_ID = c1.APP_ID) as remark from OPAS_BIZ_INP_APPL_C1 c1 left join OPAS_FICO_SD_BLAZE c2 on (c2.APP_ID = c1.APP_ID) left join OPAS_PBOC_CREDIT_CUE c3 on (c1.APP_ID = c3.APP_ID) left join OPAS_BIZ_APPROVAL c5 on (c1.APP_ID = c5.APP_ID) left join OPAS_FICO_YDJ_BLAZE c6 on (c1.APP_ID = c6.APP_ID) left join OPAS_FICO_SD_BLAZE c7 on (c1.APP_ID = c7.APP_ID) left join OPAS_REVIEW_DECISION_RESULT c8 on (c1.APP_ID = c8.APP_ID) left join OPAS_TELCHECK_RESULT c9 on (c1.APP_ID = c9.APP_ID) left join OPAS_BIZ_ZM_IVS_DATA c10 on (c1.APP_ID = c10.APP_ID) left join OPAS_BIZ_ZM_SCOR_DATA c11 on (c1.APP_ID = c11.APP_ID) left join OPAS_BIZ_SPECIALLIST_SCORE c12 on ( c1.APP_ID = c12.APP_ID)
left join OPAS_ALLOT_APPLY_ALLOT c14 on (c1.APP_ID = c14.APP_ID) where c1.APP_ID = #{appId}

select c1.APP_ID, c1.C1_CONAME, c1.C4_APBATCH, c1.YDJ_FLAG, c2.DECISION_DESP, c6.PROPOSED_LMT, c6.CDT_SCORE, c3.NUMBER_READ, c6.JOB_BF_MINCOME, C6.REF_UN_PLGE_DTI,c6.DECISION_DESP, c6.REF_CP_DTI, c6.REF_MUE, c5.MASTERCARD_APPROVEREUSLT, c5.APPROVE_CREDIT_PRODUCT, c5.APPROVE_CREDIT_LIMIT, c5.APPROVE_RESULT, c5.POLICY_CODE1, c5.VIOLATE_CODE1, c5.REFUSE_CODE1, c5.MEMO, c5.CREDIT_RESULT,c5.APPROVER, c5.MANUAL_LIMIT, c6.UN_PLGE_DTI, c6.CP_DTI,c6.MUE, c7.CUST_TYPE, c8.AUDITOR_NAME, c9.CREDITER_NAME, c10.IVS_SCORE, c11.ZM_SCORE, c12.BRCREDITPOINT, get_age(#{appId}) as AGE, c14.CURR_STATUS, (select count(OPAS_ALLOT_APPLY_REMARK.REMARK_ID) from OPAS_ALLOT_APPLY_REMARK where OPAS_ALLOT_APPLY_REMARK.APP_ID = c1.APP_ID) as remark from OPAS_BIZ_INP_APPL_C1 c1 left join OPAS_FICO_YDJ_BLAZE c2 on (c2.APP_ID = c1.APP_ID) left join OPAS_PBOC_CREDIT_CUE c3 on (c1.APP_ID = c3.APP_ID) left join OPAS_BIZ_APPROVAL c5 on (c1.APP_ID = c5.APP_ID) left join OPAS_FICO_YDJ_BLAZE c6 on (c1.APP_ID = c6.APP_ID) left join OPAS_FICO_SD_BLAZE c7 on (c1.APP_ID = c7.APP_ID) left join OPAS_REVIEW_DECISION_RESULT c8 on (c1.APP_ID = c8.APP_ID) left join OPAS_TELCHECK_RESULT c9 on (c1.APP_ID = c9.APP_ID) left join OPAS_BIZ_ZM_IVS_DATA c10 on (c1.APP_ID = c10.APP_ID) left join OPAS_BIZ_ZM_SCOR_DATA c11 on (c1.APP_ID = c11.APP_ID) left join OPAS_BIZ_SPECIALLIST_SCORE c12 on ( c1.APP_ID = c12.APP_ID)
left join OPAS_ALLOT_APPLY_ALLOT c14 on (c1.APP_ID = c14.APP_ID) where c1.APP_ID = #{appId}

select c1.APP_ID, c1.C1_CONAME, c1.C4_APBATCH, c1.YDJ_FLAG, c2.DECISION_DESP, c6.PROPOSED_LMT, c6.CDT_SCORE, c3.NUMBER_READ, c6.JOB_BF_MINCOME, C6.REF_UN_PLGE_DTI,c6.DECISION_DESP, c6.REF_CP_DTI, c6.REF_MUE, c5.MASTERCARD_APPROVEREUSLT, c5.APPROVE_CREDIT_PRODUCT, c5.APPROVE_CREDIT_LIMIT, c5.APPROVE_RESULT, c5.POLICY_CODE1, c5.VIOLATE_CODE1, c5.REFUSE_CODE1, c5.MEMO, c5.CREDIT_RESULT,c5.APPROVER, c5.MANUAL_LIMIT, c6.UN_PLGE_DTI, c6.CP_DTI,c6.MUE, c7.CUST_TYPE, c8.AUDITOR_NAME, c9.CREDITER_NAME, c10.IVS_SCORE, c11.ZM_SCORE, c12.BRCREDITPOINT, get_age(#{appId}) as AGE, c14.CURR_STATUS, (select count(OPAS_ALLOT_APPLY_REMARK.REMARK_ID) from OPAS_ALLOT_APPLY_REMARK where OPAS_ALLOT_APPLY_REMARK.APP_ID = c1.APP_ID) as remark from OPAS_BIZ_INP_APPL_HISTORY_C1 c1 left join OPAS_FICO_YDJ_BLAZE c2 on (c1.APP_ID = c2.APP_ID) left join OPAS_PBOC_CREDIT_CUE c3 on (c1.APP_ID = c3.APP_ID) left join OPAS_BIZ_APPROVAL c5 on (c1.APP_ID = c5.APP_ID) left join OPAS_FICO_YDJ_BLAZE c6 on (c1.APP_ID = c6.APP_ID) left join OPAS_FICO_SD_BLAZE c7 on (c1.APP_ID = c7.APP_ID) left join OPAS_REVIEW_DECISION_RESULT c8 on (c1.APP_ID = c8.APP_ID) left join OPAS_TELCHECK_RESULT c9 on (c1.APP_ID = c9.APP_ID) left join OPAS_BIZ_ZM_IVS_DATA c10 on (c1.APP_ID = c10.APP_ID) left join OPAS_BIZ_ZM_SCOR_DATA c11 on (c1.APP_ID = c11.APP_ID) left join OPAS_BIZ_SPECIALLIST_SCORE c12 on ( c1.APP_ID = c12.APP_ID) left join OPAS_ALLOT_APPLY_ALLOT c14 on (c1.APP_ID = c14.APP_ID) where c1.APP_ID = #{appId}

select c1.APP_ID, c1.C1_CONAME, c1.C4_APBATCH, c1.YDJ_FLAG, c2.DECISION_DESP, c7.PROPOSED_LMT, c7.TRIGGER_TYPE, c3.NUMBER_READ, c6.JOB_BF_MINCOME, C6.REF_UN_PLGE_DTI,c6.DECISION_DESP, c6.REF_CP_DTI, c6.REF_MUE, c5.MASTERCARD_APPROVEREUSLT, c5.APPROVE_CREDIT_PRODUCT, c5.APPROVE_CREDIT_LIMIT, c5.APPROVE_RESULT, c5.POLICY_CODE1,c5.APPROVER, c5.VIOLATE_CODE1, c5.REFUSE_CODE1, c5.MEMO, c5.CREDIT_RESULT, c5.MANUAL_LIMIT, c6.UN_PLGE_DTI, c6.CP_DTI,c6.MUE, c7.CUST_TYPE, c8.AUDITOR_NAME, c9.CREDITER_NAME, c10.IVS_SCORE, c11.ZM_SCORE, c12.BRCREDITPOINT, get_age(#{appId}) as AGE, c14.CURR_STATUS, (select count(OPAS_ALLOT_APPLY_REMARK.REMARK_ID) from OPAS_ALLOT_APPLY_REMARK where OPAS_ALLOT_APPLY_REMARK.APP_ID = c1.APP_ID) as remark from OPAS_BIZ_INP_APPL_HISTORY_C1 c1 left join OPAS_FICO_SD_BLAZE c2 on (c1.APP_ID = c2.APP_ID) left join OPAS_PBOC_CREDIT_CUE c3 on (c1.APP_ID = c3.APP_ID) left join OPAS_BIZ_APPROVAL c5 on (c1.APP_ID = c5.APP_ID) left join OPAS_FICO_YDJ_BLAZE c6 on (c1.APP_ID = c6.APP_ID) left join OPAS_FICO_SD_BLAZE c7 on (c1.APP_ID = c7.APP_ID) left join OPAS_REVIEW_DECISION_RESULT c8 on (c1.APP_ID = c8.APP_ID) left join OPAS_TELCHECK_RESULT c9 on (c1.APP_ID = c9.APP_ID) left join OPAS_BIZ_ZM_IVS_DATA c10 on (c1.APP_ID = c10.APP_ID) left join OPAS_BIZ_ZM_SCOR_DATA c11 on (c1.APP_ID = c11.APP_ID) left join OPAS_BIZ_SPECIALLIST_SCORE c12 on ( c1.APP_ID = c12.APP_ID)
left join OPAS_ALLOT_APPLY_ALLOT c14 on (c1.APP_ID = c14.APP_ID) where c1.APP_ID = #{appId}
select YDJ_FLAG,MATCHING_CARD_FLAG FROM OPAS_BIZ_INP_APPL_C1 where app_id = #{appId}
select OPERATE_DESC from (select e.OPERATE_DESC,app_id, row_number() over(partition by e.APP_ID order by e.crt_date desc) rank from OPAS_APPLY_LIFE_CICLE e ) where app_id = #{appIdPlus} and rank = 1

select count(1) from CAMS_WANGSHEN_INPUT_APPLN c
and c.app_id like '${appId}%'
and c.name like '${name}%'
and c.cert_no like '${certNo}%'
and c.mobile = #{mobile}

select c.app_id, c.name, c.cert_no, c.mobile, (case when b.node_desc is null then '流程结束' else b.node_desc end) node_desc from CAMS_WANGSHEN_INPUT_APPLN c left join cams_workflow_node_instance n on n.process_id = c.app_id left join cams_workflow_node b on n.process_no = b.process_no and n.node_no = b.node_no
and c.app_id like '${appId}%'
and c.name like '${name}%'
and c.cert_no like '${certNo}%'
and c.mobile = #{mobile}
select count(1) from cams_workflow_node_history c where c.process_id = #{appId} order by c.start_time asc

select * from (select (case n.node_desc when '开始' then '进件' when '结束' then '流程结束' else n.node_desc end) node_desc, (case h.node_status when 1 then '开始' when 3 then '处理' when 4 then '回退' when 5 then '阻塞' when 512 then '异常' else '完成' end) node_status, h.start_time, h.end_time from cams_workflow_node_history h join cams_workflow_node n on h.process_no = n.process_no and h.node_no = n.node_no where h.process_id = #{appId}
union select (case n.node_desc when '开始' then '进件' when '结束' then '流程结束' else n.node_desc end) node_desc, (case i.node_status when 1 then '开始' when 3 then '处理' when 4 then '回退' when 5 then '阻塞' when 512 then '异常' else '完成' end) node_status, i.start_time, i.start_time as end_time from cams_workflow_node_instance i join cams_workflow_node n on i.process_no = n.process_no and i.node_no = n.node_no where i.process_id = #{appId}) order by start_time

select a.NAME, a.CERT_TYPE, a.CERT_NO, a.MOBILE, a.ENTERPRISE_NAME, a.WORK_PROVINCE, a.WORK_AREA, a.WORK_ADDRESS, a.BRNCH_NAME, a.PROMT_ORG, a.COMPANY_NO_3RD, a.CHANNEL_NO_3RD, MOBILE_IDENTIFIED, (select approve_result from CAMS_WORKFLOW_TASK where app_id = #{appId} and status in (15,2)) as APPROVE_RESULT from CAMS_WANGSHEN_INPUT_APPLN a where a.app_id = #{appId}

select count(1) from OPAS_BIZ_INP_STOCK c
and c.app_id like '${appId}%'
and c.surname like '${name}%'
and c.custr_nbr like '${certNo}%'
and c.mobile = #{mobile}

select c.app_id,c.surname as name,c.custr_nbr as cert_no, c.mobile, (case when b.node_desc is null then '流程结束' else b.node_desc end) node_desc from OPAS_BIZ_INP_STOCK c left join cams_workflow_node_instance n on n.process_id = c.app_id left join cams_workflow_node b on n.process_no = b.process_no and n.node_no = b.node_no
and c.app_id like '${appId}%'
and c.surname like '${name}%'
and c.custr_nbr like '${certNo}%'
and c.mobile = #{mobile}
select count(1) from cams_workflow_node_history c where c.process_id = #{appId} order by c.start_time asc

select n.node_desc, (case h.node_status when 1 then '开始' when 3 then '处理' when 4 then '回退' when 5 then '阻塞' when 512 then '异常' else '完成' end) node_status, h.start_time, h.end_time from cams_workflow_node_history h join cams_workflow_node n on h.process_no = n.process_no and h.node_no = n.node_no where h.process_id = #{appId} order by h.start_time

select s.app_id,s.custr_nbr,s.surname,s.product,s.addl_card,s.acc_type,s.cdfrm,s.embname_d,s.cdespmtd, s.stm_code,s.mail_to,s.addr1_l1,s.addr1_l2,s.addr1_l3,s.addr1_l4,s.post_code,s.addr1_type,s.pin_chk,s.sms_yn, s.sms_freeyn,s.cdiss_flag,s.iss_mod,s.rushflg,s.rushfee,s.courierf,s.emboss_cpy,s.prmag_cd,s.mobile,s.match_flag, s.resi_taxid,s.custr_type,s.active_now,s.vcn_chnl,(select approve_result from opas_biz_approval where app_id = #{appId}) as approve_result from opas_biz_inp_stock s where s.app_id = #{appId}

select i.app_id, i.product, (select p.prod_name from opas_param_card_product p where p.card_code = i.product and p.status = '1' and rownum < 2) as product_name , i.card_nbr from opas_interface_4093 i where i.app_id like #{appId} order by i.app_id
select s.finish , s.remark from opas_biz_inp_stock_flow s where s.app_id like #{appId} and s.interface_type = '4093' and rownum < 2
